summary: After uploading all blocks of the video file, call McnContentCompleteCreateVideo to complete the video uploading process
description: After uploading all blocks of the video file, call McnContentCompleteCreateVideo to complete the video uploading process.

query.name: uploadId
query.description: come from the result of McnContentInitCreateVideo

query.name: parts
query.description: a json string contains e_tag info of each block

query.name: coverUrl
query.description: optional. cover Image of videoreturn by calling McnContentUploadImage

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/content/mcn/video/block/commit')
request.add_api_parameter("uploadId", "ABCDEF")
request.add_api_parameter("parts", "[{\"partNumber\":1,\"eTag\":\"AB693ADF0DF340F50637686D65CC062C\"},{\"partNumber\":2,\"eTag\":\"557C398778A948415C388B347509CE1C\"}]")
request.add_api_parameter("title", "hello")
request.add_api_parameter("coverUrl", "http://lazada.com/cover")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/content/mcn/video/block/commit')
request.add_api_param('uploadId', 'ABCDEF')
request.add_api_param('parts', '[{\"partNumber\":1,\"eTag\":\"AB693ADF0DF340F50637686D65CC062C\"},{\"partNumber\":2,\"eTag\":\"557C398778A948415C388B347509CE1C\"}]')
request.add_api_param('title', 'hello')
request.add_api_param('coverUrl', 'http://lazada.com/cover')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
